CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The solutionprocessable titanium suboxide ( TiO x ) layer was employed as an optical spacer 30,31 and as a hole blocker 27 between the bulk heterojunction(BHJ) layer and the top metal electrode.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| solutionprocessable titanium suboxide |
| TiO x |
| bulk heterojunction layer |
| top metal electrode |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| solutionprocessable titanium suboxide |
| TiO x |

I have removed "the bulk heterojunction(BHJ) layer" and "the top metal electrode" as they are not values of material properties, but rather types of layers or electrodes.
